# outputPaused

**Type Property**

Indicates whether speech output in the synthesizer has been paused by sending the message [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/pauseSpeaking(at:)].

## Declaration

```swift
static let outputPaused: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.StatusKey
```

## Status Keys

- **numberOfCharactersLeft**: The number of characters left in the input string of text.
- **outputBusy**: Indicates whether the synthesizer is currently producing speech.
- **phonemeCode**: Indicates that the synthesizer is in phoneme-processing mode. When in phoneme-processing mode, a text buffer is interpreted to be a series of characters representing various phonemes and prosodic controls.
